column2: You need §R$COST$§! $PIETYNAME$ to create an Empire.

§Y$TARGET$§! is not of the True Faith - which is all the cause §Y$CLAIMANT$§! needs to invade the §Y$TITLE$§!. If successful, everything §Y$TARGET$§! controls within the §Y$TITLE$§! will be taken or vassalized.
Iqta Levy Laws control the proportion of their levies that Muslim vassal lords nominally have to provide their liege.
Vassal lords must only provide you with a majority of their levies.
Vassal lords may retain a significant portion of their levies for themselves.
Vassal lords retain small mobile retinues in addition to their garrisons.
Vassal lords are obliged to provide their entire levy.
Unlike Christian Feudal lords, Muslim vassal lords are not tax exempt, but they do pay less than burghers.
Vassal lords are exempted from taxation - they like this state of affairs.
Vassal lords are expected to make a small financial contribution towards the greater good of the realm. They expect this.
Vassal lords are expected to make a substantial financial contribution towards the greater good of the realm. They are mildly disappointed by this.
Vassal lords are expected to make a large financial contribution towards the greater good of the realm. They are very displeased with this.
A Tax on the non-Muslim population, this tax is larger than the Zakat tax payed by Muslims and therefore increases the total tax income
Dukes and above can only be transferred to their De Jure liege
